name: Potion Path
description:
The king has fallen ill, and now Matteo will have to do something he never thought he would: ask a witch for help.

.・゜゜・　Features　・゜゜・.
  • 550k words.
  • ~ 20min of gameplay.
  • 4 endings.
  • 2 (very) small minigames.
.・゜゜・　Music　・゜゜・.

May you have - Bonnie Grace

Adventure - Alexander Nakarada

From Stardust - Christoffer Moe Ditlevsen

.・゜゜・　Socials　・゜゜・.
